channel.desc: Grizelda wants to help the Rainbow Kingdom, just like True, so she gets her Grizmos to build a giant robot: The Grizbot; when Frookie takes control of it, True has to come to her friends' rescue.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mittens & Pants
channel.desc: When a present mix-up means Post Pig Petunia, Mittens and Pants almost ruin Christmas, they realize the true meaning of Christmas may not be presents.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes, Mr. Brilliant and Rare Bear; Jonathan and Judy might be impressed.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: Gary and Stuffy want to have a picnic, but Gary refuses to try a snack that is new to him; with help from his friends, Gary resolves to try a taste.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: Nate and Nico try their best to avoid making a mess on the tracks while delivering barrels of gooey maple syrup to the town's pancake party.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: When Farmer Faye can't bring the animals to the snow, she brings the snow to the animals.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kingdom Force
channel.desc: It's a race against time after Envie Fernandez steals the Plains Kingdom's cherished night birds during the coming-of-cat ceremony.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Heartland
channel.desc: Amy and Ty get some unexpected news about Luke just as Amy has to face an upsetting truth about Spartan.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A pair of early retirees have ?1.3 million to spend on an impressive home in the country; they want a place with character and a spacious period property with at least four bedrooms, but the most vital feature turns out to be sky high ceilings.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Family Feud Canada
channel.desc: The Naboulsi family returns to face the Nero family.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Strays
channel.desc: Shannon's friendship with Lara seems unrequited; Paul learns a lesson when Nikki borrows his van; Kristian inadvertently helps Ravi get over a deep-seated fear.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Wild Cards
channel.desc: Max and Ellis go undercover, joining the cast and crew of a reality show to find out who murdered its star; in a world of scandal, deceit and lip-filler parties, every cast member is under suspicion.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: An unexpected turn of events leads to a hastily-planned wedding; Shelagh finally goes into labor; the arrival of the pill leads to unforeseen consequences.
